title: the amount of free lp loss im getting is ridiculous.
body:
sitting at silver 4, 0lp

game 1: adc never connects. i start remake vote and my whole team declines. jhin never reconnects. free loss.

game 2: win

game 3: strong jg and botlane diffrence. couldnt carry. free loss. 

game 4: win

game 5: loading screen never comes up. i exit client and log back in, game says still in progress and never gives me the option to reconnect. free loss. 


i dont even know why i keep trying.
